DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate 2 eat disorder prevention program design increase body satisfaction among adolescent female body image concern .
DOC.detailed_description: Adolescent girl body dissatisfaction ( N=481 ; SD=1.4 ) randomize dissonance-based thin-ideal internalization reduction program , healthy weight control program , expressive-writing control condition , assessment-only control condition . Dissonance participant show significantly great decrease thin-ideal internalization , body dissatisfaction , negative affect , eat disorder symptom , psychosocial impairment , low risk eat pathology onset 2-3 year follow-up assessment-only control . Dissonance participant show great decrease thin-ideal internalization , body dissatisfaction , psychosocial impairment expressive-writing control . Healthy weight participant show great decrease thin-ideal internalization , body dissatisfaction , negative affect , eat disorder symptom , psychosocial impairment , less increase weight , low risk eat pathology obesity onset 2-3 year follow-up assessment-only control . Healthy weight participant show great decrease thin-ideal internalization weight expressive writing control . Dissonance participant show 60 % reduction risk eat pathology onset healthy weight participant show 61 % reduction risk eat pathology onset 55 % reduction risk obesity onset relative assessment-only control 3-year follow-up , implying effect clinically important enduring .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Selfreported body image concern
